item.title: 10.2. gist interface
item.description: Gistã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚§ã‚¤ã‚¹ gist.el ã‚‚ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ãŒã€ãã‚‚ãã‚‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§ç®¡ç†ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒãªã„ã‹ã‚‰ Gistã‚’ä½¿ã†ã®ã ã¨æ€ã†ã®ã§ post å°‚ç”¨ã®ç°¡å˜ãªé–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½œã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ gist ã‚’installã—ã¦ãŠãå¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ $ sudo apt install gist ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒŠãƒ«ã§ gist --help ã¨æ‰“ã¤ã¨æ²¢å±±ã®èµ·å‹•ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã€‚ gist -o ã§ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆå¾Œã®çµæœã® URLã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã§é–‹ã„ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ã“ã‚Œã‚’æ¡ç”¨ã—ãŸã€‚ (leaf *gist-configurations :bind ("s-g" . gist-region-or-buffer) :init (defun gist-description () "Add gist description." (code-quote-argument (read-from-minibuffer "Add gist description: "))) (defun gist-filename () "The character string entered in minibuffer is used as file-name. If enter is pressed without file-name, that's will be buffer-file-neme." (interactive) (let ((file (file-name-nondirectory (buffer-file-name (current-buffer))))) (read-from-minibuffer (format "File name (%s): " file) file))) (defun gist-region-or-buffer () "If region is selected, post from the region.

item.title: 10.5. magit
item.description: [magit.el] Gitã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆ ğŸ”— magit/magit.el: Git user interface. magit status ã¯ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ã¯ other-window ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ãŒã€ãƒ•ãƒ«ãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒ ã§è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ (leaf magit :ensure t :bind (("M-g s" . magit-status) ("M-g b" . magit-blame) ("M-g t" . git-timemachine-toggle)) :hook (magit-post-refresh-hook . diff-hl-magit-post-refresh) :custom (transient-history-file . "~/.emacs.d/tmp/transient-history") :init (leaf diff-hl :ensure t :hook ((after-init-hook . global-diff-hl-mode) (after-init-hook . diff-hl-margin-mode))) (leaf git-timemachine :ensure t) (leaf browse-at-remote :ensure t :custom (browse-at-remote-prefer-symbolic . nil))) (setq magit-display-buffer-function #'magit-display-buffer-fullframe-status-v1)

item.title: 10.6. counsel-tramp
item.description: [counsel-tramp.el] ğŸ”— masasam/emacs-counsel-tramp: Tramp ivy interface for ssh and docker and â€vagrant. (leaf counsel-tramp :ensure t :custom `((tramp-persistency-file-name . ,"~/.emacs.d/tmp/tramp") (tramp-default-method . "scp") (counsel-tramp-custom-connections . '(/scp:xsrv:/home/minorugh/gospel-haiku.com/public_html/))) :config (defun my:tramp-quit () "Quit tramp, if tramp connencted." (interactive) (when (get-buffer "*tramp/scp xsrv*") (tramp-cleanup-all-connections) (counsel-tramp-quit) (message "Tramp Quit!"))))

item.title: 10.7. easy-hugo
item.description: [eagy-hugo.el] ãƒãƒ«ãƒãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ç®¡ç† masasam/emacs-easy-hugo: Emacs major mode for managing hugo. Hugoã§ä½œæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚’æ›¸ããŸã‚ã® Emacs ãƒ¡ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ¼ ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚ (leaf easy-hugo :ensure t :bind (("C-c C-e" . easy-hugo) ("C-x p" . easy-hugo-preview) ("C-x P" . easy-hugo-publish) (:easy-hugo-mode-map ([tab] . easy-hugo-no-help) ("<return>" . easy-hugo-view) ("o" . easy-hugo-open-basedir) ("r" . easy-hugo-rename) ("e" . my:edit-easy-hugo))) :config ;; Sort-publishday on startup (setq easy-hugo--sort-char-flg nil) (setq easy-hugo--sort-time-flg nil) (setq easy-hugo--sort-publishday-flg 1) :init ;; Main blog (=blog1) (setq easy-hugo-basedir "~/Dropbox/minorugh/snap/") (setq easy-hugo-url "https://snap.

item.title: 10.8. open-junk-file
item.description: [open-junk-file.el] ä½¿ã„æ¨ã¦ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’æ›¸ãã€é–‹ã ğŸ”— rubikitch/open-junk-file: Write a disposable file. ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ howmãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€howm-list ã‹ã‚‰ã®æ¤œç´¢æ©Ÿèƒ½ãŒåˆ©ç”¨ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ howmã¯ã€ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒå­—ã§ã®æ—¥æœ¬èªæ¤œç´¢ã‚‚å¯èƒ½ãªã®ã§ã¨ã¦ã‚‚ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ã€‚ (leaf open-junk-file :ensure t :config (setq open-junk-file-format "~/Dropbox/howm/junk/%Y%m%d.") (setq open-junk-file-find-file-function 'find-file)) ç›´è¿‘ã® junkãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å³é–‹ã‘ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã« open-last-junk-file ã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ (leaf em-glob :require t :config (defvar junk-file-dir "~/Dropbox/howm/junk/") (defun open-last-junk-file () "Open last created junk-file." (interactive) (find-file (car (last (eelisp-extended-glob (concat (file-name-as-directory junk-file-dir) "*.*.*")))))))
